scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n api,web -c auto "bun run dev:api" "bun run dev:web"
scripts.db:up: docker compose -f infra/docker-compose.yml up -d || docker-compose -f infra/docker-compose.yml up -d
scripts.db:down: docker compose -f infra/docker-compose.yml down || docker-compose -f infra/docker-compose.yml down
scripts.db:reset: bun run db:down && bun run db:up && bun run db:migrate && bun run db:seed
scripts.lint: bun run --cwd packages/shared lint && bun run --cwd apps/api lint && bun run --cwd apps/web lint
scripts.typecheck: bun run typecheck:api && bun run typecheck:web
scripts.test: bun run test:api && bun run test:web
